original_title: Malaysian businessman Dato Chan Tien visits BOI
original_body_lines: Malaysian businessman and former Chairman and Director of Cardiff City Football Club Dato Chan Tien Ghee paid a courtesy call to the Board of Investment (BOI) to understand Sri Lanka’s readiness for doing business in multiple sectors and the current economic situation post-IMF program. Dato is currently Managing Director of Central Malaysian Properties Malaysia Sdn Bhd and leads a Canadian-based fund investing in real estate. BOI officials and Port City officials participated in
